name: Lamps On
description:
It's a 2D hack and slash game created for Ludum Dare 48. there are two lamps in the scene (green & red). you have to keep and eye on them and don't let the enemies grab it.

for killing enemies walking on Ground : Mouse Left Click

Movement : Right Arrow, Left Arrow , A, D

for killing enemies jumping from the Cliff: Hold F then Mouse Left Click
